Articles.Content:
^There are three launch vehicles that I would use to the end of the earth if there were mods for them.

They are the Atlas LV-3B, the Titan II GLV and the N1. And the N1 from your other pack doesn\'t count, it can barely get into orbit.

Or you could just MacGyver (kerbalize) them from existing mod packs out there (with the exception of N1, obviously =P)
Hey you goign to make the freaky titan outside fuel lines

I already made a Titan Delta Heavy for myself using two common core boosters. (1 FL500, 1 FL1000 (FL400 rebalanced for my own nefarious purposes stock, and Nova\'s LFE (no gimballing!)) Center stage has two FL1000 tanks, and one of Nova\'s LFEs (again, no gimballing) and a clusterfuck of RCS. Next stage is one FL500, one of the orbital maneuvering engines, another clusterfuck of RCS, one of the service capsule thingies that is designed like the one in OP, Quabit\'s decoupler shroud, Nova\'s thin decoupler, and his SIDR/NovaPunch 1m nosecone.

It put me into geostationary orbit.

Turns out it was a Delta.

I already made a Titan Delta Heavy for myself using two common core boosters. (1 FL500, 1 FL1000 (FL400 rebalanced for my own nefarious purposes stock, and Nova\'s LFE (no gimballing!)) Center stage has two FL1000 tanks, and one of Nova\'s LFEs (again, no gimballing) and a clusterfuck of RCS. Next stage is one FL500, one of the orbital maneuvering engines, another clusterfuck of RCS, one of the service capsule thingies that is designed like the one in OP, Quabit\'s decoupler shroud, Nova\'s thin decoupler, and his SIDR/NovaPunch 1m nosecone.

It put me into geostationary orbit.

Turns out it was a Delta.

Mind sharing it in the 'Kerbalized Rockets' thread?

Mind sharing it in the 'Kerbalized Rockets' thread?

I will when I\'m on my computer. Posting from my phone.
That\'s a great Titan, Silisko. Any chance of you posting the .craft for that?
can your version make KSP abruptly stop working

can your version make KSP abruptly stop working

If you install it wrong, yes.

You have to empty the Parts folder, then install it. It\'s liable to break lots of things if you just extract it over a full parts folder.

If you install it wrong, yes.

You have to empty the Parts folder, then install it. It\'s liable to break lots of things if you just extract it over a full parts folder.

No, no, no. You don\'t do that, get default KSP, and copy/paste the silisko edition stuff into the parts folder. No extraction needed.

No, no, no. You don\'t do that, get default KSP, and copy/paste the silisko edition stuff into the parts folder. No extraction needed.

You\'re arguing with the person who created the pack on how to install it...

By 'extract' I mean either copy/paste or drag into an empty parts folder. Or, at least, a folder cleared of Silisko Edition or stock parts. Some things have been renamed for consistency\'s sake, and it\'d break things immensely if you just place it over SE or stock...

I have a button called Extract that just takes the files and puts them wherever.

What OS do you have?

I have a button called Extract that just takes the files and puts them wherever.

What OS do you have?

Windows... I\'m using WinRAR. I dunno if the default utility has the ability to extract to a specified location.

If not, that\'s kinda sad.
I de-installed WinRar. It became such a pain downloading normal things, WinRar archive was replacing normal folders. Â¬_Â¬
What IS that?
Wait, is that a four panel conical decoupler?!!? Please tell me it\'s true! My dreams of performing a true Apollo-style moon landing will become that much closer!

Wait, is that a four panel conical decoupler?!!? Please tell me it\'s true! My dreams of performing a true Apollo-style moon landing will become that much closer!

It is, and it\'s already in the pack.
I\'ve not seen this anywhere else to clarify - Is the SIDR (i.e. NovaPunch) DIFFERENT from the Silisko Edition parts?

Completely. SIDR was Nova\'s previous general parts pack before this one. This pack uses different models replacing the stock models, allowing for more varied rockets compaired to stock. SIDR is also no longer updated, so has become part of Novapunch, with sundaypunches Wobbly Rockets pack.

I de-installed WinRar. It became such a pain downloading normal things, WinRar archive was replacing normal folders. Â¬_Â¬

When you\'re installing it you can choose what files to associate with.
is that the latest version
i think i found the major problem error i didn\'t follow the install guide :-[

yes it is the latest version.

You really need to think before you post.

sorry for bumping this post but i have a few questions i need to ask

is there any way to keep all of the parts with out messing up the original vanilla parts thanks Bryan Ashenden AKA meteorite 101
